name: DIANA-MD ☣️
description: ⚡ A savage WhatsApp bot built to dominate chats with toxic style! Powered by Node.js for max chaos.

SESSION_ID.description: 🔐 Your bot’s secret key. Use Pairing code or qr to get this or *Toxic-MD* won’t start! 😤

OWNER_NUMBER.description: 📱 Your WhatsApp number (with country code, no +). Who’s runnin’ this show? 💪

OWNER_NAME.description: 👑 Your name, the boss of *Toxic-MD*. Flex it in the bot’s credits! 😎

PREFIX.description: 🔠 Command trigger (e.g., ‘.’ for !ping). Keep it short or look like a clown! 🤡
